item.title: Me
item.description: Hey there! 👋 Who Am I? 🏃 I’m Daniel Gospodinow, a twentyish male born in Dimitrovgrad, Bulgaria 🇧🇬 who’s on his journey to get the best from life by employing his full potential of social and technical skills. 🧑‍💻 Currently, I work as a full-time software engineer at SAP in Sofia, Bulgaria. 👨‍🎓 Also, after my recent graduation as a Bachelor’s in Computer Science, I’m now pursuing my Master’s degree in Technology Entrepreneurship at Sofia University.

item.title: Interests
item.description: Coding 💻 (Under Construction) How I Started (TODO) I’ve been programming for a while now. I started programming in my early high school years. My first programming love sparks were born when I started writing World of Warcraft macros at the age of 15. After a couple of years, I found out to be simple Lua scripts. I was quite fascinated by this fact because that’s when I realized that those macros were my first steps in the programming world.
